title: Brutal Doom
description: A gameplay mod that adds enhanced gore, fatalities, new weapons, and modernized mechanics to classic Doom. Features headshots, dual-wielding, executions, and enhanced enemy AI. One of the most popular Doom mods ever created.

screenshots.caption: A fatality being executed on a Chaingunner.

youtubeVideos.title: Brutal Doom v21 Gold Release Trailer

notes: [ModDB](https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom) • [Forum](https://www.doomworld.com/forum/topic/57406-brutal-doom-version-21-release/) • Load with any IWAD or map pack.
